plot: A simple girl, Maya De La Rosa, her older sister, Cristina Rose, and Cristina's son are introduced as tour guides for their hometown, San Nicolas, with their mother running a souvenir shop....
plot_en: A simple girl, Maya De La Rosa, her older sister, Cristina Rose, and Cristina's son are introduced as tour guides for their hometown, San Nicolas, with their mother running a souvenir shop....

title: Be Careful with My Heart
